channel.title: CVE Feed for Tad -- Uploader
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Tad -- Uploader

item.title: CVE-2021-41976|2024-08-04T03:22:25.770Z -- tad -- uploader
item.description: Tad Uploader edit book list function is vulnerable to authorization bypass, thus remote attackers can use the function to amend the folder names in the book list without logging in.

item.title: CVE-2021-41567|2024-08-04T03:15:29.080Z -- tad -- uploader
item.description: The new add subject parameter of Tad Uploader view book list function fails to filter special characters. Unauthenticated attackers can remotely inject JavaScript syntax and execute stored XSS attacks.
